---
name: "Docs Content Task"
about: Track writing content for a specific docs page
labels: ["docs", "content"]
---

# Page

- Path: <replace with docs relative path, e.g. `docs/guide/quickstart.md`>
- Section: <guide|concepts|compiler|core|cli|plugins|how-to>

# Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Page has a clear title and frontmatter
- [ ] Intro paragraph explains purpose and audience
- [ ] At least one runnable or realistic code example
- [ ] Cross-links to related topics and API pages
- [ ] No dead links; verified locally
- [ ] Style matches house style (headings, admonitions, tone)

- Context/outline:
